titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage the building of housing for moderate income seniors.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage the building of housing for moderate income seniors.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Housing for the elderly and disabled

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the low-income housing tax credit, to qualify for such credit low-income housing units that are available to individuals who have attained the age of 62 and whose incomes are 140% or less of the income limitation required for occupants of such housing units.
